T04sanss04u:12: yaḥ kulaputra mūrddhâbhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastv apaharati
T04sanss04u:13: sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā /
T04sanss04u:16: yaḥ punar dharmaṃ pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā
T04sanss04u:18: mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayatîyaṃ dvitīyā mūlâpattiḥ //
T04sanss04u:23: śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy apaharati apaharāyati /
T04sanss04u:24: gṛhasthaṃ vā karoti kāye daṇḍaiḥ praharati cārake vā prakṣipati
T04sanss04u:26: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati
T04sanss04u:27: pitaram arhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ vā jīvitād vyaparopayati
T04sanss04u:30: ebhiḥ pañcabhir ānantaryair karmabhir anyatarânyataraṃ karmôtpādayatîyaṃ caturthī mūlâpattiḥ //
T04sanss04u:32: daśâkuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate 'nyāṃś ca bahūn
T04sanss04u:33: satvān daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati vinayati
T04sanss04u:36: yaḥ punar grāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrabhedaṃ karotîyaṃ mūlâpattiḥ //
T04sanss04u:41: yābhir mūlâpattibhiḥ skhalitâdikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvâvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni
T04sanss04u:43: vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti
T04sanss04u:46: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunâsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke
T04sanss04u:47: upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityêdaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti /
T04sanss04u:50: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvêdaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrântaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti /
T04sanss04u:51: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇâgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti /
T04sanss04u:52: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvantôttrasyanti
T04sanss04u:58: yayā mūlâpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvâvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati /
T04sanss04u:61: tasmād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena parapudgalānām āśayânuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathâśayānāṃ satvānām anupūrveṇa
T04sanss04u:65: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva
T04sanss04u:68: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ /
T04sanss04u:69: na tvaṃ śakyasy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ /
T04sanss04u:70: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam
T04sanss04u:73: yāvad yathāpūrvôktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvit-yā
T04sanss04u:75: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati /
T04sanss04u:77: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T04sanss04u:80: yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma
T04sanss04u:81: samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ /
T04sanss04u:82: yāvad yathāpūrvôktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā
T04sanss04u:84: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatvâivaṃ vakṣyati /
T04sanss04u:86: mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata /
T04sanss04u:88: na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha /
T04sanss04u:89: na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśântaṃ kartuṃ /
T04sanss04u:91: śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ côpadiśata /
T04sanss04u:94: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantîdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam
T04sanss04u:96: ubhayor api mūlâpatir bhavatîyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya
T04sanss04u:98: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā
T04sanss04u:100: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokârthaṃ lŌübhasatkŌürahetoḥ paṭhanti svâdhyŌüyanti dhŌürayanti vŌücayanti
T04sanss04u:107: te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante
T04sanss04u:108: upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ câvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti /
T04sanss04u:110: atas te īrṣyahetunā côttarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti /
T04sanss04u:111: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayâpāyagāmino bhavanti /
T04sanss04u:112: yathā kaścit puruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gacched gantuṃ nāvā samudram
T04sanss04u:113: avatarate sa mahāsamudre svayam eva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt tatrâiva
T04sanss04u:115: evam eva ye ādikarmikā bodhisatvā mahāguṇasāgaram
T04sanss04u:117: tatpratyayāt te śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpnuvanti /
T04sanss04u:118: evaṃ te bālâdikarmikā bodhisatvêrṣyāhetor anṛtapratyayā mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante /
T04sanss04u:122: śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrântâdhāraṇīkṣāntisamādhibhūmisvalaṃkṛtamahāvidvatpuruṣāṇāṃ kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ gocarās tān mahāyānasūtrântān
T04sanss04u:123: paṭhanti svâdhyāyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa vācayitvā
T04sanss04u:125: ahaṃ cêmān dharmān svabuddhyā buddhvâivaṃ ca punar ahaṃ kāruṇyahetos tavôpadiśāmi /
T04sanss04u:126: tvayā vā punas tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvam atra gambhīreṣu
T04sanss04u:130: evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama /
T04sanss04u:131: etarhi na punar eva dadāti paṭhitamātreṇâham imān evaṃrūpān
T04sanss04u:134: tatpratyayāt sarvatryadhvagatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānām āryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sâparādhiko bhavati /
T04sanss04u:141: tad yathā kaścit puruṣo mahâṭavīṃ prasthitaḥ
T04sanss04u:143: āhārârthaṃ sôdāraphalavṛkṣam apahāya gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam anāsvādya viṣavṛkṣam abhiruhya viṣaphalāni
T04sanss04u:146: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ sanniśritya
T04sanss04u:148: upadarśayanti parān paṃsayanti evaṃrūpāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim
T04sanss04u:149: āpadyante yayā gurukayâpattyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti /
T04sanss04u:150: apāyagāminas tathārūpāś ca pudgalā na sevanīyāḥ
T04sanss04u:152: yaś ca tān sevate sa sâtisāro bhavati sarvavijñānāṃ /
T04sanss04u:155: kṣatriyāṇāṃ purohitacaṇḍālâmātyacaṇḍālā bhaṭacaṇḍālā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamānino mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ /
T04sanss04u:163: tenôpadraveṇa te bhikṣavaḥ paudgalikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā
T04sanss04u:164: cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā staupikaṃ vā śramaṇair apahṛtya
T04sanss04u:180: tena ca hetunā bhikṣūṇām apy upaśāntāḥ kleśā nôpaśamyanti
T04sanss04u:182: tatkāle punas te bhikṣavâśayavipannā bhavanti śīlavipannāś ca bhavanti /
T04sanss04u:189: te bhūyasyā mātrayā saparicārasya kṣatriyasya satkṛtā bhavanti
T04sanss04u:191: te ca prahāṇâbhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhastheṣv avarṇaṃ niścārayanti /
T04sanss04u:192: sa ca kṣatriyaḥ saparivāraḥ prahāṇâbhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇām
T04sanss04u:195: yas tatra prahāṇikānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upabhogaparibhogas taṃ svâdhyāyâbhiratānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ niryātayanti /
T04sanss04u:207: yadi te bodhisatvâkāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasya nāma śrutvā
T04sanss04u:210: yadi te ākāśagarbhaṃ bodhisatvaṃ namaskuryuḥ nāma câsya
T04sanss04u:211: parikīrttayeyus teṣāṃ sa kulaputro yathā bhāgyatayā svarūpeṇâgratas tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yāvad dārikārūpeṇa purataḥ
T04sanss04u:221: yadi teṣāṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ na dadāti /
T04sanss04u:223: tenâdikarmikeṇa bodhisatvena sâparādhena paścime yāme utthāyâsanāt prāṅmukhena sthitvā dhūpaṃ dhūpayitavyaṃ /
T04sanss04u:226: aruṇâruṇa mahākṛpa mahābhāga mahôditas tvaṃ jambudvīpe
T04sanss04u:228: śīghram ākāśagarbhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ mama vacanena bodhaya /
T04sanss04u:230: mama svapnântare tam upāyam upadarśaya yenâham upāyenâpattiṃ pratideśayāmi /
T04sanss04u:232: tena tatkālaṃ śayyāyāṃ nidrāpayitavyaṃ sahôdgate 'ruṇe iha
T04sanss04u:235: tasyâdikarmikasya bodhisatvasya svapnântare purataḥ sthitvā tāṃ mūlâpattiṃ deśayati mahāyānôpāyena /
T04sanss04u:239: sudṛḍhavyavasthitaś ca bhavati mahāyānae ity ādi //
T04sanss04u:240: atha vā yo 'tra sūtre 'dhyeṣaṇamantraḥ pūrvam uktaḥ /
T04sanss04u:243: araṇye upavane 'bhyavakāśe vāgaraṃ vā tagaraṃ vā kālânusāri
T04sanss04u:245: prāñjalinā ca bhūtvā samantato digvidikṣu ca pañcamaṇḍalakena
T04sanss04u:255: murara vegadhāri namucame bhujayata kāruṇika cintāmaṇi pūraya kāruṇika
T04sanss04u:267: yadi kṣatriyâdayo 'pi bodhisatvāḥ katham eṣām āpattiniyamo 'nyeṣāṃ câdhikyaṃ /
T04sanss04u:273: ṣāṃ yatra bahulaṃ saṃbhavaḥ te tatrâkoṭitāḥ
T04sanss04u:276: yena vā prakṛtimahāsâvadyatayâsamādāno 'py abhavyo bhavaty ucchinnakuśalamūlaś ca sutarāṃ tena sāmvarikêty alam
T04sanss04u:279: kiṃ vâpi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ prātimokṣaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ kalpaśatasahasram api mūlaphalabhakṣaḥ syāt /
T04sanss04u:281: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair vihared iyaṃ bodhisatvasya gurukā mūlâpattiḥ /
T04sanss04u:282: tad yathā kulaputra śrāvakayānīyo mūlâpattim āpannaḥ so 'bhavyas tair eva skandhaiḥ parinirvātum /
T04sanss04u:283: evam eva kulaputro 'pratideśyâitām āpattim aniḥsṛjya tān
T04sanss04u:304: daṇḍāpayed vā śramaṇān dadyād vā śaraṇatrayāt //
T04sanss04u:305: gṛhṇīyād dīyamānaṃ vā śamathe tyājanāt punaḥ /
T04sanss04u:315: yo mahābrahman mamôddiśya pravrajito duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣu-
T04sanss04u:320: atha ca punaḥ sa duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur adyâpi
T04sanss04u:321: sarvadevānāṃ yāvat sarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ yāvat puṇyanidhīnāṃ darśayitā bhavati kalyāṇamitraṃ /
T04sanss04u:322: kiṃ câpi sâpātrībhūtaḥ tena ca punaḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍena
T04sanss04u:326: tasmād yo mamôddiśya pravrajitaḥ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā tasya
T04sanss04u:327: nânujānāmi cakravarttir ājñām api yan mamôddiśya
T04sanss04u:328: pravrajitasya sahadharmeṇâpi kāye daṇḍaprahāraṃ vā dātuṃ cārake vā prakṣeptuṃ /
T04sanss04u:329: aṅgam aṅgaṃ vikarttanaṃ vā kartuṃ jīvitād vā vyaparopaṇaṃ kartuṃ-
T04sanss04u:333: atha ca punaḥ sa pudgalo gorocanakastūrikāsadṛśêti /
T04sanss04u:335: ye mamôddiśya pravrajitān yānabhūtān pātrabhūtān vā
T04sanss04u:336: viheṭhayiṣyanti te sarveṣāṃ tryadhvagatānāṃ buddhānām atīva
T04sanss04u:343: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahūni śrāvakaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni
T04sanss04u:344: ca bodhisatvaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato 'ntike evaṃrūpaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karmâvaraṇaṃ pratideśayanti /
T04sanss04u:345: vayam api bhadanta bhagavan bahūnāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pravacane pātrabhūtān
T04sanss04u:346: pātrabhūtāṃś ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakayānīyān pudgalāñ jugupsitavantaḥ paṃsitavanto
T04sanss04u:348: tena vayaṃ karmâvaraṇena triṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ //
T04sanss04u:353: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān vacanais tarjitavantaḥ paribhāṣitavantaḥ /
T04sanss04u:355: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān apātrabhūtān patrâbhūtāṃś ca
T04sanss04u:362: vayaṃ bhagavantam uddiśya pravrajitān gṛhasthān kāritavantaḥ
T04sanss04u:367: pātrabhūtāś ca sâparādhikāś cārake prakṣiptās tena vayaṃ karmâvaraṇena bahūn kalpāṃs tṛṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tī-
T04sanss04u:377: caturbhir mahānāman dharmaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhī akṣaṇaprāpto bhavati /
T04sanss04u:378: jātyandhaś ca jaḍaś câjihvakaś ca caṇḍālaś ca jātu
T04sanss04u:379: sukhito bhavaty abhyākhyānabahulaś ca ṣaṇḍakaś ca paṇḍakaś ca
T04sanss04u:381: strī ca bhavati śvā ca śūkaraś ca gardabhaś côṣṭraś ca
T04sanss04u:382: āśīviṣaś ca bhavati tatra tatra jātau //
T04sanss04u:384: iha mahānāman gṛhī pūrvajinakrṭâdhikārāṇāṃ satvānāṃ naiṣkramyacittasya pravrajyācittasyâryamārgacittasyântarāyaṃ karoti /
T04sanss04u:386: punar aparaṃ gṛhī dhanalaulyena putralaulyena karmavipākam
T04sanss04u:387: aśraddadhat putrasya vā duhitur vā bhāryāyā vā jñātisaṃghasyâiśvaryasthāne vartamāne pravrajyântarāyaṃ karoti /
T04sanss04u:400: kapālântaracarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye mastakaṃ bhittvā
T04sanss04u:402: jihvâmiṣabhujo nāma pakṣiṇo ye jihvāṃ vidāryâbhito 'bhitaḥ prabhakṣayanti /
T04sanss04u:403: sâpi jihvā bhuktā punar api saṃjāyate padmadalakomalatarā /
T04sanss04u:412: marmaguhyakā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sarvāṇi marmavivarāṇi bhittvā
T04sanss04u:413: marmāṇi kṛntayitvā vivarāṇi praviśya majjāmaṇḍaṃ pibanti
T04sanss04u:415: sūcīchidrā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sūcīsadṛśatuṇḍā raktaṃ pibanti /
T04sanss04u:418: keśôṇḍukā nāma pakṣiṇo ye keśamūlāny utpāṭayanti //
T04sanss04u:421: tatra tair anyair nārakeyaiḥ sahânekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi
T04sanss04u:423: sa kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ sarvasmād duṣkhajālaparivṛtaḥ /
T04sanss04u:424: śvabhraprapāto nāma dvitīyaḥ pradeśas tatra gacchati /
T04sanss04u:425: trāṇânveṣī śaraṇânveṣī paritrāṇânveṣī samantatâikādaśabhir arciskandhair āvṛto niḥsahāyaḥ
T04sanss04u:428: abhiprapannas taṃ śvabhraprapātaṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
T04sanss04u:433: sukumārataraḥ ślakṣṇataraḥ kharābhis tīvrābhir vedanābhir abhibhūtaḥ /
T04sanss04u:434: tasyâivaṃ bhayaviklavavadanasya karacaraṇasarvâṅgapratyaṅgapravilīyamānasya sa pradeśaḥ śvabhraprapāto nāma prādurbhavati /
T04sanss04u:435: sa tasmin deśe nipatati patitaḥ śvabhre prapatati trīṇi
T04sanss04u:439: yāvat tasyâivam utkṣipyamānasya ca prapatataś cânekāni
T04sanss04u:441: kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ paribhrāmitaś cakrâṅkaṃ vivaraṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati /
T04sanss04u:442: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe sahasrârāṇi cakrāṇi prādurbhavanti
T04sanss04u:443: vajranābhīni tīkṣṇajvālāni śīghrabhramāṇi tasya sahagamanād eva tā-
T04sanss04u:447: pratyekaṃ sarvâṅgāni pramathnanto dahanti pādatale câsya
T04sanss04u:452: bhukto bhuktaḥ punar api saṃjāyate sukumārataraḥ /
T04sanss04u:457: sâiṣa duṣkṛtakarmântacārī ālātacakranirmāṇagandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāsadṛśaṃ mahad arthajātaṃ paśyati ratnavastradhanadhānyanikarabhūtaṃ /
T04sanss04u:467: na câsyânādikālapravṛttaḥ sa lobhas tām apy avasthāṃ gatasya parihīyatae iti //
T04sanss04u:469: eṣa sa pāpakartā tasmāc chastrasaṅkaṭān muktaḥ kathamapy aṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā karmaṇā bhrāmitaḥ pradeśam anyaṃ prapadyate /
T04sanss04u:470: vitathadarśanaṃ nāma tatra karmakṛtāṃ striyaṃ paśyati yā tena
T04sanss04u:473: sa tena dhāvati yena tā striyaḥ /
T04sanss04u:476: gṛhītvā câuṣṭhāt prabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathâsya
T04sanss04u:481: sa kaṭukāṃ kharāṃ vedanām anubhavaṃs tasmād rāgâgner na
T04sanss04u:483: yena tā striyas tena bhūyaḥ saḥ saṃdhāvati /
T04sanss04u:487: atha tā striyo bhūyo vajramayâyomayaprajvalitagātrās taṃ manuṣyam ādāya jvālāmālâkulasarvaśarīrās taṃ nārakeyaṃ siktāmuṣṭivad bhindanti /

T04sanss04u:983: tat kiṃ manyase kulaputrâpi nu sa puruṣo bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet //
T04sanss04u:985: bahu bhadanta bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaved aprameyam
T04sanss04u:987: na tasya puṇyaskandhasya kenacic chakyaṃ pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ anyatra tathāgatena //
T04sanss04u:989: yas tu kulaputra kṣatriyakalyāṇo vā yāvad yathā pūrvôktaṃ / pe /
T04sanss04u:991: yāvad vipulataram apramāṇataram asaṃkhyeyataraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati /
T04sanss04u:992: yo mama paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ saddharmanetrī rakṣati sa rakṣaty ātmānaṃ /
T04sanss04u:993: rakṣati parāṃś ca rakṣati paralokaṃ rakṣati mama śāsanaṃ śrāvakān pātrabhūtān apātrabhūtān vā yāva-
T04sanss04u:998: yāvat svakaṃ rāṣṭraṃ pararāṣṭraṃ ca vardhayati /
T04sanss04u:1000: surâlayaṃ ca prāpayati ciraṃ câyuḥ pālayati /
T04sanss04u:1007: nityaṃ kalyāṇamitrair buddhaiś ca bhagavadbhir bodhisatvaiś ca
T04sanss04u:1014: ye te bhadanta bhagavan etarhy anāgate 'dhvani yāvat paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇā bhavanti yāvad gahapatikalyāṇāḥ / pe /
T04sanss04u:1016: vayam api sarve saparivārās taṃ kṣatriyakalyāṇaṃ yāvad gahapatikalyāṇaṃ daśabhir ākārai rakṣiṣyāmaḥ
T04sanss04u:1019: āyuś câsya vardhayiṣyāmaḥ āyurantarāyaṃ ca dharmeṇa
T04sanss04u:1021: ārogyaṃ ca parivāraṃ ca dhanaskandhaṃ côpabhogaparibhogaṃ câiśvaryaṃ ca yaśaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇi prajñāsampadaṃ ca
T04sanss04u:1030: yas tv eṣāṃ buddhaputrāṇāṃ naraḥ kurvītâpriyaṃ /
T04sanss04u:1031: devān manuṣyān varjitvā narakaṃ tasya gocaraṃ //
T04sanss04u:1033: na câtra viśeṣahetuḥ kaścid upadarśayituṃ śakyatae ity alaṃ vikalpena //
T04sanss04u:1037: āvaraṇaṃ mañjuśrīr ucyate rāgâvaraṇaṃ dveṣâvaraṇaṃ mohâvaraṇaṃ dānam āvaraṇaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñâvaraṇaṃ / pe /
T04sanss04u:1038: tat kasya hetoḥ bālapṛthagjanā mañjuśrīr dānaṃ dadānā matsariṇām antike 'prasādaṃ kurvanti /
T04sanss04u:1043: te teṣāṃ doṣaṃ śrutvā bahujanasyâprasādaṃ kurvanti /
T04sanss04u:1050: te vīryam ārabhamāṇâtmānam utkarṣayanti parān paṃsayanti /
T04sanss04u:1051: kusīdême bhikṣavo viharanty anabhiyuktāḥ śraddhādeyaṃ paribhuñjānāḥ /
T04sanss04u:1053: te tena vīryârambheṇâtmānam utkarṣayanti paraṃ ca paṃsayanti /
T04sanss04u:1055: te dhyānaṃ samāpadyamānās tatra dhyānasamāpattau spṛhām
T04sanss04u:1069: saced bodhisatvasyântike hīnasaṃjñām utpādayati ātmani côdārasaṃjñāṃ kṣiṇoty ātmānaṃ-
T04sanss04u:1076: na devaputra bodhisatvaḥ kvacid eva kuśalamūlāni samucchinatti /
T04sanss04u:1083: iha dṛḍhamate sa pudgalaḥ pāñcagatike saṃsāre upapanno bhavati /
T04sanss04u:1084: yadi vā nirayeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā deveṣu
T04sanss04u:1096: atha khalv āyuṣmān mahākāśyapo bhagavantam etad avocat /
T04sanss04u:1100: na hy asmākam etaj jñānaṃ pravarttate /
T04sanss04u:1103: tato vayaṃ bhagavann ajānānās tathārūpeṣu hīnasaṃjñām
T04sanss04u:1108: sādhu sādhu kāśyapa subhāṣitā te iyaṃ vāk /
T04sanss04u:1114: yac chīghraṃ kṣaṇyati hi bhikṣavaḥ pudgalaḥ pudgalaṃ pravicinvan /
T04sanss04u:1115: ahaṃ vā pudgalaṃ pramiṇuyāṃ yo vā syān mādṛśaḥ /
T04sanss04u:1116: etena kāśyapa nirdeśena bodhisatvena vā śrāvakeṇa vā
T04sanss04u:1118: mâtra kaścid bodhisatvayānikaḥ pudgalo bhavet tena tatrâtmā rakṣitavyêti /
T04sanss04u:1119: yasya tu niyatam eva bodhiprāpticihnam asti tatra sutarām avamanyanā
T04sanss04u:1122: iṣṭāmayān mṛttikasaṃcitān vā prītāś ca kurvanti jinasya
T04sanss04u:1124: uddiśya vā pāṃśukarâśayo 'pi aṭavīṣu durgeṣu ca
T04sanss04u:1126: siktāmayā vā puna kūṭa kṛtvā ye kecid uddiśya jināna stūpān /
T04sanss04u:1139: sarve ca te bodhi abhūṣi lābhinaḥ //
T04sanss04u:1143: sugatānam uddiśyatha pūjanârthaṃ gītaṃ ca gītaṃ madhuraṃ manojñaṃ /
T04sanss04u:1167: tad yathā vāḍiśikena mahaty udakasarasi matsyâkarṣaṇârthaṃ sâmiṣaṃ vaḍiśaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavet samanantaraprakṣiptaṃ ca
T04sanss04u:1169: kiṃ câpi sa matsyôdakasarasi bhramaty atha ca punar vaddhâiva
T04sanss04u:1171: yat sa vāḍiśikâgatya tena sūtralāghavena jānāti /
T04sanss04u:1173: tam enaṃ sūtrād gṛhītvā sthalagataṃ ka-
T04sanss04u:1176: evam eva ye satvā buddheṣu bhagavatsu cittaṃ prasādya kuśalamūlam
T04sanss04u:1179: kiṃ câpi te satvā duṣkṛtena karmâvaraṇenâkṣaṇeṣûpapannā bhavanty atha ca buddhā bhagavantas tān satvān bauddhena
T04sanss04u:1180: jñānena saṃgrahavastusūtreṇa gṛhītvā saṃsārôdakasarasôddhṛtya nirvāṇasthale sthāpayantîti //
T04sanss04u:1184: yathā meghena dramiḍena mahābodhisatvenâpi satā navakâryasudhanaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya vanditaḥ /
T04sanss04u:1194: kiṃ ca buddhānām apy evam iṣyate /
T04sanss04u:1199: yo hi kaścin mañjuśrīs tathāgatabhāṣitadharme kasmiṃścic chobhanasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
T04sanss04u:1204: yâivaṃ vadatîdaṃ yuktam idam ayuktam iti sa saddharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanss04u:1205: na mayā pṛthak kaścid dharmaḥ śrāvakayānasaṃprayuktaḥ
T04sanss04u:1207: tat te mohapuruṣêmaṃ mama dharmaṃ nānākariṣyanti /
T04sanss04u:1208: idaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ deśitam idaṃ pratyekabuddhānām idaṃ bodhisatvānām iti /
T04sanss04u:1217: apagate buddhôtpāde nâsti dhāraṇīpratilambhêti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanss04u:1227: āloko 'sya dharmāṇāṃ na suviditêti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanss04u:1228: mantreṇa mantram abudhyamānaḥ prativadatîti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanss04u:1232: akṣarasaṃjñayā kañcid adhimuktaṃ karoti kañcin na karotîti
T04sanss04u:1237: ihâsyâsti caryêhâsya nâsti caryêti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanss04u:1238: idaṃ sûktam idam asûktam iti dharmaṃ pratikṣipati /
T04sanss04u:1241: dharmaṃ pratikṣipatîti hi mañjuśrīr yāvat kiñcid vilopayati
T04sanss04u:1243: dharmabhāṇakasyêdaṃ rūpam iti cintayati vadati bhikṣur vā
T04sanss04u:1247: yasya kasyacit kulaputra tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya dharmaḥ pratibhāti
T04sanss04u:1249: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi yady ekasatvasyâpi ekaromaharṣo bhaved ekâśrupāto vā sarvaḥ sa tathāgatânubhāvena /
T04sanss04u:1250: tatra mohapuruṣâbodhisatvā bodhisatvapratijñā bodhisatvadūṣakā dharmastainyakuhakâivaṃ vakṣyanti
T04sanss04u:1261: yo bodhisatvo dharmabhāṇakam apavādati buddhaṃ sa vigarhati
T04sanss04u:1262: dharmaṃ sa pratikṣipati saṃghaṃ sa jugupsati /
T04sanss04u:1264: buddhaṃ sa na draṣṭukāmo yo dharmabhāṇakam adraṣṭukāmaḥ /
T04sanss04u:1265: buddhasya so 'varṇaṃ bhāṣate yo dharmabhāṇakasyâvarṇaṃ bhāṣate /
T04sanss04u:1266: buddhas tena parityakto bhavati yaḥ prathamacittôtpādike 'pi
T04sanss04u:1269: yo 'py ayaṃ maitreya ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bodhisatvānāṃ saṃbodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣâivaṃ vakṣyanti /
T04sanss04u:1273: tat kiṃ manyase 'jita duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājâbhūd yena
T04sanss04u:1278: yāni mayā maitreya bodhisatvacaryāṃ caratā ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāny upacitāni apakṛtaṃ nu taiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ //
T04sanss04u:1282: tvaṃ tāvad ajita ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān śīlapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān
T04sanss04u:1283: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān vīryapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān dhyānapāramitāyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṃ kalpān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samudāgataḥ /
